Room.Name: Golden Shield Shoppe
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the Golden Shield Shoppe, owned by the gnome Theodenes.
Room.LongDescription: Theodenes is an old and wizened little gnome, but at one time, in the service of his king, he was a mighty warrior. After he was disabled in combat he returned to the craft he had apprenticed in as a young gnome. Today, he is known as a master craftsman for the fine shields he makes. Both Prince Ragnar and Prince Rutger, of the Lyanden line, consider his shields the highest quality available.
